title: ArtyTorrent Pack 41-Hip Hop Electro Breaks 90-99bpm v1-WAV sampl
description:
ArtyTorrent Pack 41-Hip Hop Electro Breaks 90-99bpm v1-WAV samples
------------------------------------------------------------------

A variety of Hip Hop drum loops at 90-99 bpm, with thumping kick drums and ear-splitting snares. These are some of the crunchiest breaks I&#039;ve ever heard. Most of these loops have already been heavily compressed, so they should automatically beef up your downtempo grooves without further processing, but feel free to slice and dice them as you please.

Torrent contains 6 RAR files with 199 loops.
--------------------------------------------
Diamond Cuts Hip Hop Drums 90-99 (29 loops)
Mac Money Electro Hip Hop 90-97 (22 loops)
Twisted Hip Hop 90-93 (5 loops)
Westside Underground Drums 90-97 (28 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 90 (52 loops)
Zero-G Hip Hop 95 (63 loops)

As usual, all samples have been normalized and acidized and are 16-bit WAVs at 44.1KHz, looped precisely and containing the approx bpm in the filenames.

The samples are from a variety of sources including CDs produced by Elab, Sony/Acid and Zero-G.

Volume 2 will follow at a later date, once I&#039;ve posted some speedier beats.

--
Arty - "Thank Crunchie it&#039;s Friday!".
8th February 2008.


P.S. If you&#039;re looking for a particular sample CD or VSTi, leave a comment and I&#039;ll see what I can do. "Thankyous" and large sums of money are also very welcome. :D
